subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=按-Hakka,咹-Hakka}}
{{rfe|zh|Uncertain. Some postulate that it is from the fusion of {{zh-l|*那物}}}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=您}}
Allegedly a contraction of {{zh-l|汝儂|tr=lí-nâng|you people}}. See {{zh-l|*儂|person; ''pronoun suffix''}} for more.
